create_mem.description: Save any content to Mem.ai for intelligent processing and future reference.

props.name: input
props.description: Raw content you want to remember - HTML, emails, transcripts, or simple notes.

props.name: instructions
props.description: Optional guidance on how you want this content processed or remembered.

props.name: context
props.description: Additional background information to relate this to your existing knowledge.

create_note.description: Log a plain-text Markdown note into Mem, optionally with formatting, templates, collections, and timestamps.

props.name: content
props.description: Markdown-formatted content. First line is treated as the note title.

props.name: id
props.description: Optional UUID to assign to the note.

props.name: add_to_collections
props.description: Collection titles or IDs to assign this note to. New collections will be created if they donâ€™t exist.

delete_note.description: Delete a note in Mem by its ID.

props.name: note_id
props.description: The ID of the note to delete.
